markdownRemark.html:
First tabata training in quarantine! Time to move, time to sweat, time to wake up your energy. You will need some weigths for more intense experience and a chair.

Photo by Tim Mossholder from Pexels

General warm-up

  • 5 minutes warm up

Round 1

  • Cross Jumping Jacks
  • Split squats (weights)

Round 2

  • Squat with front kick
  • Side plank with squat

Round 3

  • High Knees
  • Bridge hips pushes

Round 4

  • X-jumps
  • Narrow push-ups

Round 5

  • Plank side jumps
  • V-ups (weights)

Round 6

  • Plank to lunge jumps
  • Squat leg raise (weights)

Round 7

  • Crab kicks
  • Standing side crunch (weights)

Round 8

  • Scissor jumps
  • Rotation (weights)

Bonus

  • 30 x Burpies
  • Punching abs

Cool down

  • General stretching

Photo by Pixabay from Pexels

Sketch :)
